mapper.select:
select proid,proName,proYear,proAccessory,proAccessoryName,proInfomation, proMeasures,proGrade,proCreateTime,proCreateId,proCreateName,proStatus,proAccessoryName from processrick
proName like CONCAT('%',#{proName},'%')
and proYear like CONCAT(#{proYear},'%')
and proGrade like CONCAT(#{proGrade},'%')
ORDER BY proCreateTime desc
